attributes.additional_details:
••••••••••••••••••#MAKEITLEGAL•••••••••••••••••••
Reasons ~
•Medical use
•Personal use
•Is NOT a gateway drug
•Not harmful (0 deaths recorded)
•Opens up business opportunities for many people
•Safer than alcohol and cigarettes (114 times safer than alcohol)
•Decrease crime around the country
•Less addictive than coffee
•Would recharge the British economy 
•Would keep people out of prison for minor crimes

In conclusion, MAKE THE CHANGE, MAKE IT LEGAL
attributes.background: We want marijuana to be legalised in the UK for medical and recreational use
